name: Butterfly Javascript Game
tagline: A butterfly adventure -very basic- game made with javascript (and game development videos)
body:
### 2D atari game project
A web series (game development tutorial videos) to teach people how to make a 2D web based game with Javascript, html, css (in Turkish)

* Play game; https://bug7a.github.io/butterfly-javascript-game/butterflyGame/
* Download source; https://sourceforge.net/projects/butterfly-javascript-game/files/
* Project page; http://basitoyunyapmak.blogspot.com.tr/2016/08/kelebegin-maceras-oyun-projesi-1-bu.html
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
